languages.text: "Полно. Фиксируем остаточное вокс-эхо переговоров, стандартные сигналы авгурных систем наблюдения, газово-тепловые следы шаттлов, заходивших на посадку... Знаете, Лорд-капитан, по-моему, это место вот-вот развалится. Авгуры наблюдают множественные следы структурных разрушений в гробнице, расположенной на планетоиде. И они совсем свежие".

"Plenty. We're picking up the remaining vox-echoes of conversations, standard signals belonging to augur observation systems, the gas-thermal trails of shuttles preparing to land... You know, Lord Captain, it seems to me that this place is about to fall apart. Augurs detect a multitude of signs pointing to structural damage in the tomb located on the planetoid. And they are very fresh."
languages.original_text: "Полно. Фиксируем остаточное вокс-эхо переговоров, стандартные сигналы авгурных систем наблюдения, газово-тепловые следы шаттлов, заходивших на посадку... Знаете, Лорд-капитан, по-моему, это место вот-вот развалится. Авгуры наблюдают множественные следы структурных разрушений в гробнице, расположенной на планетоиде. И они совсем свежие".

languages.text: “到处都是。我们接收到了音阵交流的回声，俄写矩阵还捕捉到了标准信号，以及着陆的穿梭机喷发的热气流……老实说，舰长大人，在我看来，这地方快要塌了。俄歇矩阵神甫发现小行星的墓穴中出现了大量的结构损坏，而且这些损坏都是最近才发生的。”
languages.original_text: "Plenty. We're picking up the remaining vox-echoes of conversations, standard signals belonging to augur observation systems, the gas-thermal trails of shuttles preparing to land... You know, Lord Captain, it seems to me that this place is about to fall apart. Augurs detect a multitude of signs pointing to structural damage in the tomb located on the planetoid. And they are very fresh."

traits.locale_text: “到处都是。我们接收到了音阵交流的回声，扫描系统还捕捉到了标准信号，以及着陆的穿梭机喷发的热气流……老实说，舰长大人，在我看来，这地方快要塌了。扫描祭司发现小行星的墓穴中出现了大量的结构损坏，而且这些损坏都是最近才发生的。”

languages.text: 「十分です。会話の残りの音声エコー、オーガー観測システムに属する標準信号、着陸準備をしているシャトルのガス熱痕跡を検知しています…ロード・キャプテン、この場所は今にも崩壊しそうです。スキャナーは小惑星にある墓の構造的な損傷を示す多くの兆候を感知しています。どれも新しいものばかりです」
languages.original_text: "Plenty. We're picking up the remaining vox-echoes of conversations, standard signals belonging to augur observation systems, the gas-thermal trails of shuttles preparing to land... You know, Lord Captain, it seems to me that this place is about to fall apart. Augurs detect a multitude of signs pointing to structural damage in the tomb located on the planetoid. And they are very fresh."

traits.locale_text: 「十分です。会話の残りの音声エコー、オーガー観測システムに属する標準信号、着陸準備をしているシャトルのガス熱痕跡を検知しています…ロード・キャプテン、この場所は今にも崩壊しそうです。スキャナーは小惑星にある墓の構造的な損傷を示す多くの兆候を感知しています。どれも新しいものばかりです」

languages.text: «Mucho. Estamos captando los ecos de voco restantes de conversaciones, las señales estándar de los sistemas de observación de los augures, las estelas de gas térmico de las lanzaderas que se preparan para aterrizar... ¿Sabe, Lord Capitán? Me parece que este lugar está a punto de desmoronarse. Los augures detectan multitud de señales que apuntan a daños estructurales en la tumba situada en el planetoide. Y son muy recientes».
languages.original_text: "Plenty. We're picking up the remaining vox-echoes of conversations, standard signals belonging to augur observation systems, the gas-thermal trails of shuttles preparing to land... You know, Lord Captain, it seems to me that this place is about to fall apart. Augurs detect a multitude of signs pointing to structural damage in the tomb located on the planetoid. And they are very fresh."

traits.locale_text: «Mucho. Estamos captando los ecos de voco restantes de conversaciones, las señales estándar de los sistemas de observación de los augures, las estelas de gas térmico de las lanzaderas que se preparan para aterrizar... ¿Sabe, Lord Capitán? Me parece que este lugar está a punto de desmoronarse. Los augures detectan multitud de señales que apuntan a daños estructurales en la tumba situada en el planetoide. Y son muy recientes».

languages.text: "Reichlich. Wir empfangen die verbleibenden Vox-Echos von Unterhaltungen, Standardsignale von Auguren-Wachsystemen, die gas-thermalen Spuren von Shuttles im Landevorgang ... Wisst Ihr, Lord Captain, mir scheint, dass hier bald alles auseinanderbricht. Die Auguren entdecken zahlreiche Zeichen, die auf strukturelle Schäden in dem Grab auf dem Planetoiden hinweisen. Und sie sind sehr frisch."
languages.original_text: "Plenty. We're picking up the remaining vox-echoes of conversations, standard signals belonging to augur observation systems, the gas-thermal trails of shuttles preparing to land... You know, Lord Captain, it seems to me that this place is about to fall apart. Augurs detect a multitude of signs pointing to structural damage in the tomb located on the planetoid. And they are very fresh."

traits.locale_text: "Reichlich. Wir empfangen die verbleibenden Vox-Echos von Unterhaltungen, Standardsignale von Auguren-Wachsystemen, die gas-thermalen Spuren von Shuttles im Landevorgang ... Wisst Ihr, Lord Captain, mir scheint, dass hier bald alles auseinanderbricht. Die Auguren entdecken zahlreiche Zeichen, die auf strukturelle Schäden in dem Grab auf dem Planetoiden hinweisen. Und sie sind sehr frisch."

languages.text: « Des tas. Nous détectons les échos-vox résiduels d'anciennes communications, des signaux standard appartenant aux systèmes d'observation des augures, les signatures thermiques de navettes s'apprêtant à atterrir... Vous savez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, j'ai la nette impression que cet endroit est sur le point de s'effondrer. Les augures ont capté une multitude d'indices témoignant de dégâts structurels dans le tombeau situé sur le planétoïde. Et tous sont très, très récents. »
languages.original_text: "Plenty. We're picking up the remaining vox-echoes of conversations, standard signals belonging to augur observation systems, the gas-thermal trails of shuttles preparing to land... You know, Lord Captain, it seems to me that this place is about to fall apart. Augurs detect a multitude of signs pointing to structural damage in the tomb located on the planetoid. And they are very fresh."

traits.locale_text: « Des tas. Les augures ont capté une multitude d'indices témoignant de dégâts structurels dans le tombeau situé sur le planétoïde. Et tous sont très, très récents. »

languages.text: "Olmaz olur mu? Sohbetlerden geriye kalan voks yankıları, alamet gözlem sistemlerinin standart sinyalleri, inmeye hazırlanan mekiklerin bıraktığı termal gaz izleri... Bir şey diyebilir miyim Lord Kaptan? Bana kalırsa burası paramparça olmaya bahane arıyor. Alametler bu cüce gezegendeki kabirde yapısal hasar gösteren pek çok işaret saptadı. Hem de bu işaretler daha yeni."
languages.original_text: "Plenty. We're picking up the remaining vox-echoes of conversations, standard signals belonging to augur observation systems, the gas-thermal trails of shuttles preparing to land... You know, Lord Captain, it seems to me that this place is about to fall apart. Augurs detect a multitude of signs pointing to structural damage in the tomb located on the planetoid. And they are very fresh."
